Service Details: - Provides support to, and enhance  the capacity of, organizations in BC that serve the homeless and those at risk of homelessness- Offers training which combines theory and practice, supports and encourages networking opportunities, organizes annual conference for shelter providers, carries out research and surveys membership to gather info about trends in the sector, and provides E Learning Sessions
